channel.title: Alice Wong
channel.description: Recent news about Alice Wong, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Richmond News
item.description:
Alice Wong tucks into bowl of shark fin soup
MP Alice Wong enjoys a bowl of shark fin soup at the Jade Restaurant during a press conference yesterday at which she voiced her support of restaurant owner David Chung and her opposition to a municipal ban of the Asian delicacy. Alice Wong MP was ...

item.title: Mentioned by Richmond Review
item.description:
Feds should chip in for seniors housing
Kudos to Greg Halsey-Brandt for his suggestion (“MP should step up in funding new seniors housing project,” Letters) that our MP Alice Wong start working on this great suggestion for the seniors in Richmond. Come on Alice—show us what you can ...

item.title: Mentioned by News
item.description:
Volunteers get federal elder abuse cash - Richmond
MP Alice Wong made her way to Richmond Wednesday morning to announce funding for Volunteer Richmond Information Services (VRIS). The organization received close to $25,000 to develop new information material to raise awareness of elder abuse, ...

item.title: Mentioned by Richmond Review
item.description:
Federal funding to safeguard seniors
Volunteer Richmond president Mary Kemmis and Richmond MP Alice Wong at Wednesday's announcement of $25,000 in federal funding to produce information material on elder abuse and power of attorney rights and responsibilities. Martin van den Hemel ...
